item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants and event scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Providence Coal Fired Pizza on Westminster St. Its at the end of Westminster Street downtown, almost to the corner of Empire St.

http://www.providencecoalfirepizza.com/

So this is really the NEWEST addition to the Westminster Street restaurant scene, and unexpectedly, its huge! There's lots o' space to hold us all and seating options abound. The food is good and the drink variety is very good, especially for beer and wine. Michael, the owner is also offering us free pizza to sample, so this one is not to miss!!!!! If you haven't discovered this gem yet, here's your chance and let's check it out! You'll be back!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

Bring a friend.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a bright blue, gradated-dyed scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Providence Coal Fired Pizza!
